title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Creator Tools and Updates
content:
The Chop Shop introduces new updates and tools in the Creator for players to use when crafting Jobs of all kinds , including:

- New props, including holiday-themed candy canes and gift boxes, and track smoothing tools
- Throwable snowball pickups
- Ability to preview the set weather while in the Creator's Ambient Settings menu
- Disable catchup and slipstream on specific checkpoints
- An option to disable boost at the start of a Race
